I spill my Coke all the time when I'm talking.
i am a weightlifter.
I want to learn more about how to overcome my fears and live a more fulfilling life.
I go to nature documentaries to feel like I'm experiencing nature without being limited by my disability.
I'm keeping it professional at work and focused on my studies.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm currently studying for a test in my math class.
Oh no, good luck with that! Are you a math major?
No, I'm actually a biology major, but I have to take some math classes as part of my degree requirements.
Oh cool! I'm a musician with a day job, and I love going to the movies. What are your hobbies?
I'm a weightlifter, and I also love to go to nature documentaries to feel like I'm experiencing nature without being limited by my disability.
That's awesome! I love nature documentaries too, but I've never been a weightlifter. What made you get into it?
I wanted to get in shape and build muscle, and weightlifting is a great way to do that.
I'm glad you found something you enjoy doing! What's your favorite part about weightlifting?
I love the feeling of getting stronger and pushing myself to new limits.
That's great! I can definitely see how that would be rewarding.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun! How about you, what's your favorite part of being a musician?
I love the creative process of writing and performing music. It's so much fun to be able to express myself through my music
